title: Appeal Representation
description: Schema defining the metadata for appeal representations, such as statements, third-party comments and final comments

representationId.description: The unique identifier for the representation
representationId.$comment: This is a composite key with the caseReference and a representation counter

status.$comment: BO workflow should validate or withdraw a representation.

redacted.description: Indicates if the representation is redacted

redactedRepresentation.description: The redacted version of the representation

redactedBy.description: Unique identifier for the case team member that performed the redaction
redactedBy.$comment: This is the user in Entra ID

examples: Another reason for setting a representation as invalid

invalidDetails.description: A list of reasons why the representation has been marked as invalid
invalidDetails.$comment: The list will contain items only if the status is `invalid`

source.description: Source of the representation (citizen or LPA)

representedId.description: ServiceUser Id of the person or organisation being represented

representativeId.description: ServiceUser Id of the agent representing the owner

lpaCode.description: Will only be filled if the representationType is a LPA statement
